snippet: LEVINE--Harold I. "Bob," age 89, died March 15, 2016 after a short illness. Very smart, very funny, very well- loved. Survived by his spouse and partner of 60 years, Lester Kushner. Memorial at a later date. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Harold I. "Bob," age 89, died March 15, 2016 after a short illness. Very smart, very funny, very well- loved. Survived by his spouse and partner of 60 years, Lester Kushner. Memorial at a later date. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEVINE, HAROLD I
